description: In a system utilizing a WSUS server, the custom update application developed with the Windows Update Agent API fails to report update status from client machines. Despite the functionality of the application in fetching and installing updates successfully, the status remains unreported on the WSUS server. This indicates a potential issue in the communication or reporting mechanism between the client machines and the WSUS server, particularly noticeable since automatic updates have been disabled on clients. Ensuring that the clients are configured correctly and that the result codes and reporting are properly captured by the agent is essential for troubleshooting this problem. The absence of status reports could hinder the ability to manage updates effectively across a network infrastructure.
